mapper.select: SELECT idx, title, hit_cnt, reg_dtm FROM board WHERE del_gb='N' ORDER BY IDX DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD ( TITLE, CONTENTS, HIT_CNT, REG_ID ) VALUES ( #{TITLE}, #{CONTENTS}, 0, 'ADMIN' )
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET HIT_CNT = COALESCE(HIT_CNT,0) + 1 WHERE IDX = ${IDX}
mapper.select: SELECT IDX, HIT_CNT, REG_DTM, REG_ID, TITLE, CONTENTS FROM BOARD WHERE IDX = ${IDX}
mapper.delete: UPDATE BOARD SET DEL_GB = 'Y' WHERE IDX = ${IDX}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_FILE ( BOARD_IDX, ORIGINAL_FILE_NAME, STORED_FILE_NAME, FILE_SIZE, REG_ID ) VALUES ( ${BOARD_IDX}, #{ORIGINAL_FILE_NAME}, #{STORED_FILE_NAME}, #{FILE_SIZE}, 'Admin' )
mapper.select: SELECT IDX, ORIGINAL_FILE_NAME, ROUND(FILE_SIZE/1024,1) AS FILE_SIZE FROM TB_FILE WHERE BOARD_IDX = ${IDX} AND DEL_GB = 'N'
